mkdir build && cd build
tar xvf jpegsrc.v9c.tar.gz
cd jpeg-9c

emconfigure ./configure --disable-shared --prefix=`pwd`/install
emmake make
emmake make install

# copy:
# * install/lib/libjpeg.a into <cocos>external/jpeg/prebuilt/emscripten/
# * install/include/* into <cocos>/external/jpeg/include/emscripten/
